code: import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShoppingCart=_ref=>{let{cartItems,onAddItem,onRemoveItem,onChangeQuantity,onCheckout,onContinueShopping}=_ref;const total=cartItems.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+(item.product.price.main*100+item.product.price.fractional)*item.quantity/100,0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onContinueShopping,children:"Continue Shopping"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.product.price.main,".",item.product.price.fractional.toString().padStart(2,"0")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onRemoveItem(item.product.id),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:item.quantity,onChange:e=>onChangeQuantity(item.product.id,parseInt(e.target.value)||0),min:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onAddItem(item.product.id),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Subtotal: $",(item.quantity*(item.product.price.main*100+item.product.price.fractional)/100).toFixed(2)]})]},item.product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Total: $",total.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onCheckout,children:"Proceed to Checkout"})]})]});};export default ShoppingCart;
